QuestData.Title: Gao-Ran Battlefront
QuestData.Description: With your help, we have quelled the spirits of this place.$B$BAt last, they may rest in peace.$B$BOur journey into this cursed land, I am afraid, has only begun.$B$BI have some important matters to finish up here, but we will be moving out soon.$B$BI need someone to go ahead and tell Lord Taran Zhu that we are joining him.$B$BFind him at the Gao-Ran Battlefront. Tell him what has transpired here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lord Taran Zhu at the Gao-Ran Battlefront in the Townlong Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: Did the northern expedition go well, then? What news do you have to report?
